title: The Paper Chase: Top 10 Databases for Investigative Reporters
description: Ron Regan's presentation at the 2012 IRE Conference in Boston, MA, discussing the top 10 databases for investigative reporters, including the Occupational Health & Safety Administration, Medicare/Nursing Homes, Federal Aviation Administration, National Transportation Safety Board, Flight tracking information, Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration, U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, and U.S. Department of Transportation.
